title: Forgot Password Page Wireframe
description: Allows users to reset their password if they forget it.

components.name: Header
components.description: Includes logo and site navigation links.

components.name: Email Input Field
components.description: Field to enter the email address associated with the account.

components.name: Reset Password Button
components.description: Button to submit the email for password reset instructions.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Links to login and registration pages.
